children: Gone are the days when TikTok was just about viral dances. It's now a powerful search engine, especially for Gen Z. If you're not optimizing your content for search, you're missing out on a massive opportunity. Hereâ€™s your guide to TikTok SEO in 2025.
Just like Google, TikTok's algorithm relies on keywords to understand what your video is about. You need to place them strategically:

items: On-screen Text: Add text overlays with your target keywords. This is one of the strongest signals for the algorithm.
Spoken Words: The algorithm transcribes your audio. Say your keywords clearly in your video.
Caption: Your caption is prime real estate. Write a descriptive sentence that includes your main keyword.
Hashtags: Use a mix of 3-5 broad and niche hashtags. Don't overdo it. Examples: `#seotips`, `#tiktokgrowth`, `#booktok`.

children: You need a strong hook. Your opening must be visually and audibly engaging to stop users from scrolling. This high watch time signals to the algorithm that your content is valuable.

TikTok prioritizes content that uses its native features. Tapping into a trending sound or effect can give your video an instant boost. Keep an eye on your For You Page to see what's currently popular.
Less is more on TikTok. A good strategy is:

items: 1-2 Broad Hashtags: Relate to the general topic (e.g., `#cooking`).
Avoid generic tags like `#fyp` or `#foryou`. They are too saturated and provide no SEO value.
